ComicInfo.Title: It's Insidious Like That
ComicInfo.Summary:
In a future where clairvoyant Augurs are used for their powers but feared, held captive, and persecuted, a disaffected military major is shocked into action by the grim realities of the Augurs' treatment. She puts her life and career on the line to help them attempt a daring escape from captivity.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Sozomaika | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Natasha Alterici | 2 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Diana an Damme | Missing |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 16:00:09. [CVDB722854]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Diana an Damme, Natasha Alterici, Sozomaika
